casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jeremy Dushane MURRELL. No. 484A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 26, 2007. Jennifer Martin, Assistant District Attorney, Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of March 2007 by Defendant to Bypass N.C. Court of Appeals:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of March 2007."
